Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at 96th/Commercial
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 100th, Torrence, Colfax, 95th and Commercial due to, street blockage near 96th/Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 100th, Torrence, Colfax, 95th and Commercial due to, street blockage near 96th/Commercial.

Allow extra travel time.
